title: Seedling Canopy Reflectance Spectra, 1992-1993 (ACCP)
summary: The reflectance spectra of Douglas-fir and bigleaf maple seedling canopies were measured. Canopies varied in fertilizer treatment and leaf area density respectively.

cmr.title: Seedling Canopy Reflectance Spectra, 1992-1993 (ACCP)
cmr.summary: The reflectance spectra of Douglas-fir and bigleaf maple seedling canopies were measured. Canopies varied in fertilizer treatment and leaf area density respectively.

citation: Gonsamo, A. and J.M. Chen. 2013. Spectral Response Function Comparability Among 21 Satellite Sensors for Vegetation Monitoring. IEEE Transactions on Geoscience and Remote Sensing. 51(3):1319-1335.

Bortolot, Z.J. and R.H. Wynne. 2010. A method for predicting fresh green leaf nitrogen concentrations from shortwave infrared reflectance spectra acquired at the canopy level that requires no in situ nitrogen data. International Journal of Remote Sensing. 24(3):619-624.
